      • getScopeCoordinates

        @Deprecated
 @Nullable
public ScopeCoordinates getScopeCoordinates(java.lang.String[] inScopeHierarchy)
        Deprecated. 
        Generic method to return the scope coordinates given a hierarchical array of strings of named scopes, where the 0th index string is the name of the broadest scope. The last indexed string is the name/id of the most specific scope.

      • getPredicateForBroadestAllowedScope

        @Nullable
public PredicateIntf getPredicateForBroadestAllowedScope(ScopeCoordinates inCoordinates,
                                                                    @NotNull
                                                                    MetafieldId inScopeLevelFieldId,
                                                                    @NotNull
                                                                    MetafieldId inScopeGkeyFieldId)
        Description copied from interface: EntityScoper

        Returns:
        the predicate for a flexibly scoped object (generic scope based on scope level and scope gkey) based on broadestAllowedScope.

      • createScopeNodeEntityLevelQuery

        @Nullable
public DomainQuery createScopeNodeEntityLevelQuery(com.navis.framework.configuration.IScopeEnum inScopeLevel,
                                                              ScopeCoordinates inScopeCoordinates)
        Description copied from interface: EntityScoper
        Query to create the different values of a a given non GLOBAL inScopeLevel (full scope path) for a supported flexibly scoped object. If parent key not available, it will generate all scope paths at the inScopeLevel. Whether to disable further scoping is left to caller.
        Specified by:
        createScopeNodeEntityLevelQuery in interface EntityScoper
